attributes.action: Stop discrimination against tea drinkers in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tea is supposedly the national drink of the United Kingdom but as surprising as it will be to some not everyone likes or can drink a cup of char. These few non-tea drinking citizens or Anteas as they are often referred face constant discrimination and ridicule from their peers. 

I urge the Government to invest heavily in educating the country towards the idea that just because you’re a non-tea drinker you are not a bad person.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
